text.data-name: is ARC? We are the Athletics & Recreation Centre. This is an exciting venture for our Algonquin Community. This facility will provide our students with a place to break through perceptual barriers in a welcoming, safe, inclusive and inviting environment f
text.tspan: is ARC? We are the Athletics & Recreation Centre. This is an
exciting venture for our Algonquin Community. This facility
will provide our students with a place to break through
perceptual barriers in a welcoming, safe, inclusive and
inviting environment for students of all backgrounds,
cultures and abilities to spark a movement.

text.data-name: is this going to cost me? This facility will be included in your activity fee. All fee-paying students can use and participate in all activities in the building. As for the facility, it will cost Algonquin College $48.8 million.
text.tspan: is this going to cost me? This facility will be included in your
activity fee. All fee-paying students can use and participate
in all activities in the building. As for the facility, it will cost

text.data-name: will the ARC building be? The ARC building will be located northeast of the Student Commons building, opposite of the residence. The facility will be an estimated 100,000 square feet! Connected to the Student Commons by a "Plus 15" Pedestrian Link.
text.tspan: will the ARC building be? The ARC building will be located
northeast of the Student Commons building, opposite of the
residence. The facility will be an estimated 100,000 square
feet! Connected to the Student Commons by a "Plus 15"
